video_prompt.title: AgriTech DApp 10-Second Pitch Video

style.visual_theme: Futuristic African agri-tech ecosystem, minimalist UI, vibrant earth tones (green, gold, brown) with neon accents, high-tech holographic overlays, glowing particle effects
style.animation_style: Smooth cinematic transitions, dynamic fly-throughs, 3D isometric animations, kinetic typography, particle streams representing blockchain data and tokens
style.camera: Dynamic fly-through over Africa, smooth zoom-ins on modules, rotating 3D elements, parallax depth for immersive effect

script.text: Introducing AgriTech, Africa's first AI and Blockchain-powered agricultural finance platform.
Connecting millions of farmers, cooperatives, and investors across the continent seamlessly.
Secure decentralized digital identities powered by AI-KYC and zero-knowledge privacy proofs.
Smart AI credit scoring for transparent trust, liquidity, and risk evaluation.
Instant microloans via automated smart contracts and pooled liquidity.
Tokenized marketplace and supply chain tracking ensure efficient farm-to-market operations.
Verified carbon credits reward climate-smart farming and offset CO2 emissions.
IoT and satellite data feed real-time insights securely into the blockchain.
AgriTech: Empowering African farmers with AI, Blockchain, and climate-smart finance.

scene_sequence.visuals: 3D animated map of Africa showing glowing lines connecting farmers, cooperatives, and investors; floating AI icons representing analytics; particle streams flow along network connections
DID identity module holograms: digital ID cards appear above farms, zero-knowledge proof shields animate, AI verification pulses; animated reputation scores rising
AI credit scoring engine: 3D bar charts dynamically rise showing Trust, Liquidity, Risk; animated SHAP/LIME explainer bars appear; glowing AI spark effects

Lending protocol: animated microloan coins flow from investors to farms via glowing smart contract nodes; repayment streams and late-fee triggers shown with dynamic particle lines; optional insurance shield icons appear
Marketplace module: 3D farm fields with tokenized crops floating above plots; AI pricing recommendation sparks; escrow contract locks animate; IoT sensor beams verifying produce shipments
Carbon credit module: animated satellite images with NDVI heatmaps, crop rotation patterns tracked; CO2 absorption visualized as flowing green energy; CARBT tokens spin and glow in 3D
IoT and data layer: drones, LoRa sensors, and weather stations emit glowing streams of data to blockchain oracles; AI anomaly detection pulses on abnormal patterns; edge processing nodes animate
scene_sequence.text_overlay: Real-time secure IoT and satellite data feeds

scene_sequence.visuals: Final wrap-up: all modules connected in glowing network mesh; UI dashboards animate showing credit, yield, and carbon impact; token flows circulate; fade into AgriTech logo with particle spark explosion
scene_sequence.text_overlay: AgriTech: Empowering African farmers with AI + Blockchain
